pages.text: If you're a good friend of $(3)piglin$() , she may trade these precious gems to you as commodities.

pages.title: Still Gem
pages.text: Still gem has a wonderful power , not only used to make $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/refining_void_mixture)void mixture$() but also can use for $(l:goldens_additions:misc/portal_frame)opening up a space$() . You can $(6)live in that space$(). Safe and comfortable.
